DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to discover the connection between BMI and oocyte and granulosa consistencies.
DOC.brief_title: The Difference Seen in Granulosa Cells and Immature Oocytes in IVF Treated Patients Sorted by Body Mass Index (BMI)
DOC.criteria: Infertile women undergoing IVF Consent to participate in study Fertility preservation due to cancer Endocrine disorders
